other_tests.changes_over_time: Random plasma cortisol levels were low at 50 nmol/L; an inadequate peak cortisol of 159 nmol/L achieved during insulin tolerance test.

other_tests.findings: Inadequate peak cortisol of 159 nmol/L despite adequate hypoglycemia.
Absent ACTH response confirmed isolated ACTH deficiency.
Demonstrated hypoperfusion of the medial temporal region, more marked on the left.
Positive for oligoclonal bands; normal total protein levels (0.2 g/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Oligoclonal bands became undetectable after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Slightly subnormal cortisol concentration at 500 nmol/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressive reduction in 30 min cortisol response over subsequent months (420, then 310 nmol/L).

other_tests.findings: Inadequate peak cortisol of 340 nmol/L despite adequate hypoglycemia.
